column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The wine was brought to our table already open
column2: which was highly unusual. The waiter later explained
column4: that the bartenders inside always do this. Not a great policy for $20+ bottle of wine
column5: in my opinion. On that note
column6: there wasn't really much ambiance to speak of at Lou Malnati's; they seem to be primarily focused on their pizzas
column7: which actually is not a bad thing.
